Smart Toothbrush: Develop a toothbrush that has built-in sensors and AI technology to track brushing habits and provide personalized feedback on brushing technique. The toothbrush could also connect to a mobile app for real-time coaching and data analysis.

Electric Toothbrush with Built-in Timers: Create an electric toothbrush with multiple built-in timers that allow users to brush for the recommended 2 minutes. The timers could be set for different brushing zones in the mouth, ensuring that users brush all areas thoroughly.

Interactive Toothbrush: Design a toothbrush that responds to different brushing techniques and provides real-time feedback through vibrations, lights, or sounds. The toothbrush could also have a built-in game or quiz to make brushing more engaging and fun.

Customizable Toothbrush: Offer a toothbrush with customizable handles and bristles that allow users to personalize their brushing experience. Users could choose from different colors, shapes, and bristle styles to suit their preferences.

Travel Toothbrush Kit: Create a travel toothbrush kit that includes a compact, lightweight toothbrush and a carrying case with built-in storage for toothpaste and floss. The kit could also include a built-in UV sanitizer to keep the toothbrush clean and hygienic while on the go.
